description.brush: Animal Brush. Use this to show affection to your animals.
description.music.box: Plays music to animals. Use this to show affection to your animals.
easterEgg.halloweenBookText: There are places older than time itself, and others where the light doesn't shine. You shouldn't be here. In this forest, the trees whisper secrets of forgotten times and shadows lurk everywhere, patiently waiting for a chance to devour any source of light that dares to shine. There's no place for adventurers or the curious like you around here...
halloween.portal.title: Minigame - Halloween
halloween.portal.description: Can you hold on inside the maze?
halloween.portal.rewardMessage: Congratulations, you completed the mission! Here is your reward.
halloween.sacrifice.intro.one: They say that on a moonless night, beneath the ancient trees, a witch gathered the most varied and powerful spirits of the earth.
halloween.sacrifice.intro.two: Each held a different echo, a unique glimmer in their gaze, and each was offered to the sacred circle under an ancient oath.
halloween.sacrifice.intro.three: When all spirits were present, the forest trembled, and in a flash of green and gold, a powerful creature was born, infused with the strength and wisdom of those who were summoned.
halloween.sacrifice.intro.four: Only one who understands the mysteries of each spirit and brings them together in perfect harmony shall be worthy of this blessing but beware, for such power is not given to just anyone.
halloween.sacrifice.suggestion: Remember to choose carefully which bears you want to sacrifice.
halloween.sacrifice.empty: You don't have any bears to sacrifice
halloween.noticeboard.two: In this event you will find a limited time Halloween Portal, where danger lurks and only the bravest bumpkins survive!
halloween.noticeboard.three: At the end of the event, special rewards will be distributed to those with the highest score in the portal!
halloween.noticeboard.four: The highest scores will receive special limited items, while those with the highest accumulated scores(sum of the best scores for each day of the event) will receive $SFL rewards!
halloween.noticeboard.five: You can also make donations to the NPC in this island, and a special gift will be given to those who donate 3 $POL or more!
christmas-delivery-mayhem.portal.title: Minigame - Christmas Delivery Mayhem
christmas-delivery-mayhem.portal.descrip: Help the elves pack their gifts. Will you have enough time to do it?
christmas-delivery-mayhem.portal.rewardM: Congratulations, you completed the mission! Here is your reward.
easterEgg.halloweenTorchText: You feel a strange sensation, as if the forest is calling to you...
description.cowScratcher: A rustic yet effective tool, perfect for giving cows a satisfying scratch after a long day in the fields. Keep your cattle happy and content!
description.spinningWheel: An elegant piece of craftsmanship, this spinning wheel turns raw wool into fine thread, essential for crafting quality textiles.
description.sleepyRug: Cozy and inviting, this soft rug is perfect for an afternoon nap. It adds warmth and charm to any space.
description.meteorite: A rare and mysterious fragment from the stars, the meteorite is rumored to hold cosmic power.
description.sheafOfPlenty: A bundle of barley harvested at peak ripeness, symbolizing abundance and the hard work of the season. +2 Barley
description.mechanicalBull: A lively attraction and test of endurance! Hop on the Mechanical Bull and see if you can hold on.
double.delivery.hint: Pssssst...there will be double rewards for deliveries on {{date}}.
craftingBox.welcome.1: Welcome to the Crafting Box! Here you can craft items with your resources.
craftingBox.welcome.2: Insert items into the crafting box to try discover new recipes. If you find a recipe, it will be saved under recipes!
craftingBox.welcome.3: Time to get crafting! What would you like to do?
craftingBoxGuide.failed: Crafting will fail if no match is found.
craftingBoxGuide.success: An item will be crafted if a match is found.
craftingBoxGuide.viewRecipe: Crafted items will be saved to your recipes.
description.infernalBullwhip: This menacing bullwhip is imbued with fiery power, making it as intimidating as it is effective. -50% Feed to Barn Animal
description.chickenSuit: Cluck your way into any gathering with this playful Chicken Suit! +1 Feather
description.cowbellNecklace: A charming necklace for any dairy enthusiast featuring a tiny, jingling cowbell that cows cant resist! +2 Milk
description.blackSheepOnesie: Stand out in the flock with this soft, warm onesie. This charming black sheep outfit adds a fun twist to cozy wear. +2 Wool
description.merinoJumper: Crafted from the finest wool, this cozy jumper provides unparalleled warmth and comfort. +1 Merino Wool
description.mooVer: A unique contraption that keeps cows active and healthy. +0.25 Leather
description.swissWhiskers: A culinary genius in miniature form, this skilled chef elevates every cheese recipe with his expert touch. +500 Cheese Recipe XP
description.cluckulator: This specialized scale accurately weighs each chicken, ensuring they receive the ideal feed portion for balanced growth and health, making poultry care more efficient and sustainable. -25% Feed to Chicken
description.ufo: This extraterrestrial craft is said to emit a soft glow and hum, creating an aura of wonder and curiosity.  Keep your eyes on the skieswho knows what otherworldly secrets it might unveil!
description.whiteSheepOnesie: Cozy up in this fluffy, woolly onesieperfect for a snug night in or a playful day in the plaza! With its irresistible charm, you will be the cutest sheep in the herd. 0.25+ Wool
description.blackSheep: A black sheep has taken up residence on your farm.
chores.ended: All that time tellin Bumpkins what to do......I'm tired. I think I need a vacation.
digby.holiday: The desert is closed today. Come back later.
delivery.holiday.closingSoon: These Bumpkins are going on a holiday...Complete your orders before they leave!
delivery.holiday.closed: These Bumpkins are on holiday...Come back later!
season.codex.howToEarn.comingSoon: Earn horseshoes from chores, deliveries and bounties!
whatsOn.bullRunText: The bull run season begins! Grab your VIP banner and prepare for the race.
whatsOn.cowSkullsText: Cow Skulls and new puzzles have appeared in the desert!
whatsOn.choreBoardText: A new 7 day chore board is now available.
whatsOn.poppyShopText: Poppy's flower shop has got an upgrade.
whatsOn.animalsLiveText: Animals are now live! Feed them, milk them, shear them and more!
whatsOn.craftingBoxText: You can now build a crafting box and craft new items!
whatsOn.bedsText: Craft the 8 beds to unlock extra farm hands.
whatsOn.choresText: Complete chores & bounties to earn horseshoes (Nov 11th)
whatsOn.megastoreText: Trade horseshoes for NFTs at the Megastore or win them at the Auction House
whatsOn.sflMarketplaceText: The $SFL marketplace is now live! Trade $SFL for NFTs.
whatsOn.auctionText: Compete and outbid your friends for the best NFTs!
whatsOn.animalCompetitionText: Complete animal tasks & climb the leaderboard to win prizes & $SFL!
whatsOn.mysterySeasonText: Prepare your resources & master the marketplace. The mystery season is coming!
chickens.deprecated.1: Chickens are now fed in the hen house.
animals.guide.feeder: Prepare food for your animals using the feeder machine.
animals.guide.food_preference: Animals prefer their favourite food but will eat any food.
animals.guide.progress: Once the progress bar is full your animal is ready to level up & drop resources.
animals.guide.sleeping: After levelling up your animal will sleep for 24 hours.
animals.guide.affection: Show affection to sleeping animals when they request it.
animals.guide.bounties: Complete weekly bounties by trading your animals for rewards..
animals.guide.sickness: Beware of sickness! Older animals are more susceptible - use Barn Delight medicine to cure them.
description.alien.chicken: A peculiar chicken from another galaxy, here to boost your feather production!
description.toxic.tuft: A mutated sheep whose toxic fleece produces the finest merino wool in the land!
description.mootant: This genetically enhanced bovine here to boost your leather production!
description.cropCircle: A mysterious circle that appears on your farm...what could it mean?
whatsOn.auction.tickets: No horseshoes from chores and bounties this week.
description.cheese: A delicious dairy delight made from fresh milk
description.pizzaMargherita: A classic Italian pizza with tomatoes and cheese
description.blueCheese: A strong flavored cheese with blue mold
description.honeyCheddar: A sweet and savory cheese infused with honey
description.capreseSalad: A fresh salad with cheese, tomatoes and kale
description.sourShake: A tangy and refreshing lemon drink
description.spaghettiLimone: A zesty pasta dish with lemon and cheese
description.lemonCheesecake: A creamy cheesecake with a citrus twist
gems.shipment.useGems: Use Gems to unlock more stock
description.kingOfBears: The king of all bears. It has the power to generate more honey for  its own consumption.
description.vampireBear: Don't put me under the sun!
description.superTotem: 2x speed for crops, trees, fruits, cooking & minerals. Lasts for 7 days
description.kingOfBears.boost: Increase Honey Yield per full beehive +0.25
description.superTotem.boost: 50% Reduction to Crop, Mineral, Fruit, Cooking and Tree Time
description.super.totem.expired: Your Super Totem has expired. Head to the Pumpkin Plaza to discover and craft more magical items to boost your farming abilities!
description.super.totem.temporarily: The Super Totem temporarily boosts your cooking, crops, trees & mineral time. Make the most of it!
description.christmasStocking: A classic festive stocking, perfect for filling with holiday treats and surprises.
description.goldenChristmasStocking: A luxurious stocking with golden accents, adding an elegant touch to your Christmas decor.
description.cozyFireplace: A warm and inviting fireplace that sets the perfect backdrop for holiday gatherings.
description.christmasRug: A festive rug adorned with seasonal patterns to bring warmth and holiday spirit to your home.
description.christmasCandle: A glowing candle with a festive scent, ideal for creating a cozy and magical atmosphere.
description.santaPenguin: A penguin thats always ready for the festive season!
description.penguinPool: Keep your eyes on these penguins or they will cause chaos on your island!
description.snowman: A special snowman that for some reason never melts!?
description.festiveToyTrain: A special snowman that for some reason never melts!?
npcDialogues.pumpkinPete.chore1: Have you seen the strange objects in the sky? Keep an eye on your crops!
npcDialogues.pumpkinPete.chore2: These new animal products are bringing so many new farming possibilities!
npcDialogues.pumpkinPete.chore3: The Farmers Market is busier than ever with all these new resources!
npcDialogues.peggy.chore1: I can barely keep up with all these new recipe requests! Everyone wants to try cooking with animal products.
npcDialogues.peggy.chore2: These new cheese and egg recipes are keeping me busy in the kitchen.
npcDialogues.peggy.chore3: I hope you're not using any gems in your cooking... that would be terrible!
npcDialogues.betty.chore1: The Farmers Market has never been this busy! We're running low on wheat, corn, and barley.
npcDialogues.betty.chore2: Everyone needs animal feed these days. The demand is through the roof!
npcDialogues.betty.chore3: I'm saving every SFL I earn from the market for my own farm someday.
npcDialogues.miranda.chore1: Have you tried growing tomatoes? I still can't decide if they're fruits or vegetables!
npcDialogues.miranda.chore2: The sun is perfect for dancing today! Though I could do without the strange sightings in the sky...
npcDialogues.miranda.chore3: Nothing beats a sunny day at the beach, especially with all this excitement about animals!
npcDialogues.blacksmith.chore1: This crafting box launch has me worried about my business...
npcDialogues.blacksmith.chore2: Quality tools for quality work - that's what I always say.
npcDialogues.blacksmith.chore3: These new animal products better not affect the metal trade.
npcDialogues.raven.chore1: I've been having visions... of a dark sheep that could change everything in Sunflower Land.
npcDialogues.raven.chore2: The shadows whisper of strange creatures in our midst...
npcDialogues.raven.chore3: These mysterious sightings... they have a dark energy about them.
npcDialogues.cornwell.chore1: I sense a dangerous storm approaching... these are uncertain times.
npcDialogues.cornwell.chore2: The crops tell me stories of change. We must prepare for what's coming.
npcDialogues.cornwell.chore3: Keep your grain stores full - we may need them in the days ahead.
npcDialogues.finley.chore1: You won't believe what I saw in the ocean - a strange cow-like creature!
npcDialogues.finley.chore2: My brother Finn might tell tall tales, but what I saw was real.
npcDialogues.finley.chore3: The waters have been different lately, something's changing out there.
npcDialogues.gordo.chore1: Have you tried the new cheese recipes? Simply magnificent!
npcDialogues.gordo.chore2: The new spaghetti and pizza dishes are to die for!
npcDialogues.gordo.chore3: These animal products are revolutionizing our cuisine!
npcDialogues.tywin.chore1: I'm implementing a new tax on all animal products. The crown must profit!
npcDialogues.tywin.chore2: These new resources must be properly regulated and taxed.
npcDialogues.tywin.chore3: The nobility requires only the finest animal products - see to it.
npcDialogues.oldSalty.chore1: Arr, I've been collecting cow skulls from my treasure hunts. Curious findings...
npcDialogues.oldSalty.chore2: The seas be changing, and strange creatures lurk in the depths.
npcDialogues.oldSalty.chore3: These cow skulls I've been finding might be worth something someday!
npcDialogues.guria.chore1: The spirits speak of a green creature, unlike any goblin I've known...
npcDialogues.guria.chore2: My crystal ball shows strange shapes in the skies above our farms.
npcDialogues.guria.chore3: The future is clouded with mysterious creatures and great change.
npcDialogues.petro.chore1: This oil shortage is getting worse by the day!
npcDialogues.petro.chore2: We need more resources to keep the machinery running smoothly.
npcDialogues.petro.chore3: These mechanical problems won't fix themselves, bring me more oil!
npcDialogues.chase.chore1: My animals have been acting strange lately. Some have gone missing!
npcDialogues.chase.chore2: There are mysterious tracks in the fields - unlike anything I've seen before.
npcDialogues.chase.chore3: Keep your animals close, strange things are happening in these parts.
npcDialogues.birdie.chore1: The new Megastore format is absolutely fabulous! Such epic sales!
npcDialogues.birdie.chore2: Have you seen the latest seasonal fashions? Simply stunning!
npcDialogues.birdie.chore3: These new animal products are inspiring some amazing new designs!
npcDialogues.grimbly.chore1: These new animal products will make excellent crafting materials!
npcDialogues.grimbly.chore2: Bring me more resources - the forge hungers for new materials!
npcDialogues.grimbly.chore3: The animals bring new opportunities for crafting. Don't keep me waiting!
npcDialogues.garth.chore1: These animal products could revolutionize my potion making!
npcDialogues.garth.chore2: I wonder what magical properties these new ingredients possess...
npcDialogues.garth.chore3: The Sunflorians won't like my experiments with these animal products!
npcDialogues.grimtooth.chore1: Arr, these new treasures from the animals be worth their weight in gold!
npcDialogues.grimtooth.chore2: The seas be changing, and so do the spoils we can plunder!
npcDialogues.grimtooth.chore3: These animal products will fetch a fine price in the black market!
npcDialogues.finn.chore1: You won't believe the size of the cow-like creature I saw in the ocean!
npcDialogues.finn.chore2: These strange sightings are affecting the fish. They're acting peculiar!
npcDialogues.finn.chore3: I've got the biggest fishing story yet - just wait till you hear it!
npcDialogues.victoria.chore1: The kingdom demands proper regulation of these new animal resources!
npcDialogues.victoria.chore2: These mysterious sightings must be investigated. The crown commands it!
npcDialogues.victoria.chore3: Ensure all animal products meet royal standards, or face consequences!
npcDialogues.gambit.chore1: Care to wager on what creature will appear in the sky next?
npcDialogues.gambit.chore2: The odds of these strange sightings are astronomical - I love it!
npcDialogues.gambit.chore3: Place your bets on which animal will go missing next!
npcDialogues.grubnuk.chore1: These animal products are worth their weight in SFL! Bring me more!
npcDialogues.grubnuk.chore2: Business is booming with all these new resources to trade!
npcDialogues.grubnuk.chore3: Strange times mean profitable trades for those who know where to look!
npcDialogues.bert.chore1: These magical mushrooms might explain the strange creatures in the sky...
npcDialogues.bert.chore2: The mushrooms tell me secrets about the missing animals!
npcDialogues.bert.chore3: Reality is getting stranger by the day - just how I like it!
npcDialogues.tango.chore1: Even the animals are dancing to these strange new rhythms!
npcDialogues.tango.chore2: The mysterious sightings make for excellent dance inspiration!
npcDialogues.tango.chore3: Let's celebrate these exciting changes with a dance!
npcDialogues.timmy.chore1: Have you seen any strange bears in the forest lately? They're acting different!
npcDialogues.timmy.chore2: The honey supplies are running low with all these new animal farms!
npcDialogues.timmy.chore3: Even the bears are curious about these mysterious sky sightings!
npcDialogues.corale.chore1: The coral reefs are buzzing with news about strange sea creatures!
npcDialogues.corale.chore2: Something big is disturbing the ocean's natural balance...
npcDialogues.corale.chore3: The fish say they've seen cow-like shadows in deeper waters!
npcDialogues.santa.intro1: Ho Ho Ho Bumpkin! For a limited time, I am giving daily rewards for those that find my scattered candy.
npcDialogues.santa.intro2: Each day you will find 10 pieces scattered throughout the Pumpkin Plaza.
npcDialogues.santa.intro3: Collect the 10 candy and claim the daily prizes!
npcDialogues.santa.dialogue1: Ho ho ho! Collect my missing candy for a reward.
npcDialogues.santa.dialogue3: Well done! You have completed the 12 Days of Christmas. Don't forget to place the Festive Tree for a special gift.
npcDialogues.santa.dialogue4: Complete the challenge 12 days in a row for a special prize.
npcDialogues.santa.dialogue5: Ho Ho Ho! Well done Bumpkin, you found my candy.
npcDialogues.ginger.dialogue1: This Festive Tree is full of gifts and decorations.
npcDialogues.ginger.dialogue2: I wonder what I can receive from Santa after shaking it...
npcDialogues.elf.dialogue1: Oops, I dropped some candies around the plaza. If you find any, bring them back to Santa for a sweet reward!
description.trade.points: Earned from trading collectibles and wearables in the marketplace. Can be exchanged for in-game rewards.
marketplace.welcomeDescription: Explore the latest items & trade with other players to build your farming empire
marketplace.powerUpsDescription: Boost your farming with exclusive items
marketplace.cosmeticsDescription: Decorate your farm with rare items
marketplace.hoarding.description: You must store your game progress in order to be able to purchase this listing.
marketplace.welcome.one: Howdy there, partner! Welcome to the Marketplace. Your one-stop shop for all things farm-tastic.
marketplace.welcome.two: Here you can trade resources, buy exclusive collectibles & boost your farm.
marketplace.welcome.three: The marketplace exclusively uses $SFL, the currency of Sunflower Land. You can earn $SFL in-game or trading with other players.
marketplace.welcome.four: Trade resources, collectibles & wearables for your farm.
marketplace.welcome.six: Earn points on trades and unlock rewards.
marketplace.welcome.seven: The marketplace items are intended for in-game use, not speculation or investment
marketplace.welcome.title: Welcome to the Marketplace
marketplace.quickswap.description: You are about to be redirected to Quickswap, a decentralized and community-driven exchange to buy $SFL.
marketplace.quickswap.warning: Prices shown in-game are estimated based on community prices & may not reflect the current market. Proceed at your own risk.
marketplace.tradeInitiated: Great news! It looks like someone is fulfilling your trade. Please wait for the trade to complete.
description.bud.generic: A friendly farming pet that will turbo charge your Sunflower Land farm and gaming experience
powerSkills.title: Power Skills
powerSkills.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to use {{skillName}}?
powerSkills.cooldownMessage: You won't be able to use this skill again for {{cooldown}}
instantCook.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to finish this recipe now?
mayor.plaza.shortIntro: Hey there Bumpkin, I am the mayor of this town and
temperateSeason.introduction.one: Howdy Farmer! Every 7 days in the real world, the season in Sunflower Land will change!
temperateSeason.introduction.two: Each season brings different opportunities. Certain crops can only grow in specific seasons. Keep an eye out for seasonal events that could affect your farm.
temperateSeason.introduction.three: Make sure to protect your crops and be prepared for anything!
description.tornadoPinwheel: A magical pinwheel that protects you from the tornado! One-use only.
temperateSeason.weatherShop.buy.descript: Buy items to protect your farm from the weather
tornado.crops.destroyed.description: A tornado has destroyed half of your crops. Please wait for the tornado to pass.
tornado.building.destroyed.description: A tornado is raging through your farm - this building is not safe! Please wait for the tornado to pass.
tornado.protected.one: You protected your farm from the tornado!
tornado.protected.two: None of your crops were destroyed.
tornado.protected.three: None of your buildings were damaged.
tornado.destroyed.one: Oh no! A tornado is destroying your farm!
tornado.destroyed.two: Some of your crops were destroyed.
tornado.destroyed.three: Some of your buildings were damaged.
